meaningMnemonic:
If you’re too <kanji>dull</kanji> to have <kanji>feeling</kanji>, you’re <vocabulary>insensitive</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>thickheaded</vocabulary>.

鈍感 often means someone's not very tuned in to emotions or what's happening around them. It's like they can miss subtle romantic hints or not sense the silent tension in a room.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
